import Link from 'next/link' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' import {API} from '../../config' const RelatedJournal = ({journal}) => { console.log(1111) return (
{journal.title}

{renderHTML(journal.democontent)}

Created At: {moment(journal.updatedAt).fromNow()}
) } export default RelatedJournal
